html: According to OMB & DHS’ report, we need to: 1. increase cyber threat awareness 2. standardize IT & cyber capabilities 3. consolidate security operations & improve incident detection/response 4. increase accountability thru improved gov’t processes
text:
According to OMB & DHS’ report, we need to: 

1. increase cyber threat awareness

2. standardize IT & cyber capabilities

3. consolidate security operations & improve incident detection/response

4. increase accountability thru improved gov’t processes

html: This creates enterprise-wide gaps in network visibility, IT tool and capability standardization and common operating procedures, which is especially concerning when roughly 75% of gov’t agencies’ cyber programs are either at risk or at high risk.

So was the Trump investigation really about our national security – or was it politically motivated?
